Note: For a production-ready setup, generate CSS variables for component tokens too.
Example mapping in CSS:
:root {
  --button-primary-bg: #22c55e;
  --button-primary-fg: #0b0b0b;
  --button-primary-border: #22c55e;
  --button-ghost-bg: transparent;
  --button-ghost-fg: #ffffff;
  --button-ghost-border: #333333;
}
